tool_description: Face Generation: use AI to dynamically generate high-resolution, photo-realistic pictures of faces based on demographic input including gender, age, and ethnicity. Test the interactive version here: https://facestudio.app
name: Face Studio
title: Face Studio

api_list.name: /generate
api_list.description: Generate a face given optional parameters: **gender**, **age**, and **ethnicity**. Ethnicity is an approximation of the corresponding ethnic/racial phenotype for a given option.

optional_parameters.name: ethnicity
optional_parameters.description: For ethnicity, the following options are available: *european*, *african*, *west_asian*, *south_asian*, *east_asian*, *southeast_asian*, and *latin_american*. If not specified, the ethnic phenotype of the face will be random.

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: For gender, the following options are available: *male* and *female*. If not specified, the gender of the face can be either male or female.

optional_parameters.name: age
optional_parameters.description: For age, the following options are available: *10s*, *20s*, *30s*, *40s*, *50s*, and *60s*. For more fine-grained control, it is also possible to input a specific *numeric* value for age. If age is not specified, then the age of the face will be random.
